battle.Status

      Stores the effects value for producing a Skill object.

      private java.util.Set<Status> Fighter.statusSet 
      Methods in battle that return Status 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status StatusBuilder.build()
      Creates a new Status object built with the values set by this builder object.
      Status Fighter.getStatus(Status status)
      Returns a Status object applied to the fighter with a matching name property to the given Status.
      Status Fighter.getStatus(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a Status object with a matching name to the given String if one has been applied to the the fighter.
      Methods in battle that return types with arguments of type Status 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Methods in battle with parameters of type Status 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SkillBuilder SkillBuilder.addEffect(Status effect)
      Adds a new Status object to apply to targets of this skill during successful execution.
      boolean Fighter.applyStatus(Status status)
      Attempts to apply the given Status object to the fighter.
      boolean Status.canCombine(Status status)
      Returns true if the the given Status object can be legally combined with this object.
      void Status.combineWith(Status status)
      Takes a Status object that can legally combine with this status and incorporates many properties, including stack size, duration, and listeners whenever applicable.
      Status Fighter.getStatus(Status status)
      Returns a Status object applied to the fighter with a matching name property to the given Status.
      boolean Fighter.hasStatus(Status status)
      Returns true if the name property of the given status matches the name of a status applied to the fighter.
      default void StatusHandler.onStatusApplication(Status status)
      Event method that handles the successful application of the status it is listening to.
      default void StatusHandler.onStatusRemoval(Status status)
      Event method that handles the successful removal of the status it is listening to.
      boolean SkillBuilder.removeEffect(Status effect)
      Removes an effect from the list of effects for producing a Skill object.
      boolean Fighter.removeStatus(Status status)
      Attempts to remove the given Status object from the fighter.
      Constructors in battle with parameters of type Status 
      Constructor and Description
      Status(Status copyOf)
      Initializes a copy of the given Status object such that direct changes to the state of either the original or the copy has no affect on the other.
      StatusBuilder(Status status)
      Instantiates the object by setting all properties so that any status built directly after initialization would be a copy of the Status object given.
      Constructor parameters in battle with type arguments of type Status 
      Constructor and Description
      Skill(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, Target target, int maxTargets, java.time.Duration cooldown, java.util.function.Predicate<Skill> useCase, boolean stunBreak, boolean deathless, java.util.List<Status> effects, java.util.List<java.lang.String> requirements, java.util.List<Skill> subSkills, java.util.List<SkillHandler> listeners)
      Initializes the object so that all internal field variables that can be explicitly set are done so through the given parameters.
